collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_title: Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection of Scripts for Television and Radio Productions
pageContext.collection_description: Includes radio scripts for Hallmark Playhouse (a.k.a. Hallmark Radio Hall of Fame), January, 1952-March 1955, and production material, property procurement and releases, 1948-1952.
